episodes.title: The Cult of Multi-Level Marketing, a Video with Narration by Robert L. FitzPatrick
episodes.description:
This is Robert FitzPatrick. Of all the presentations I have prepared for consumers on multi-level marketing, MLM, I consider this one the most important.

 If you are in an MLM or are being enrolled or want to know what MLM is all about, I believe this presentation will be the most important information for you to escape or avoid its entrapment to help other escape or avoid it.

 MLM’s primary method of deception is disguise.  This presentation removes the disguises to reveal MLM’s actual identity. What is uncovered is grotesque and disturbing. Some people will not face it.  

MLM is a coercive cult and a destructive pyramid scheme. 

From my experience, as long as MLM is allowed to wear its masks, of “business”, “income opportunity” and “direct selling,” it maintains power to deceive, and protection from law enforcement and media exposure. 

This presentation focuses on cult identity. However, to see the cult, MLM itself must fully identified and the pyramid scheme must also be understood. Then, how it gains control over people’s lives and inflicts its personal and financial damage become clear.
